Package Classes

Class Game

java.lang.Object
Classes.Game
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
Game class handles all information associated with a game.

      Parameters:

    • create

      public static boolean create​(java.sql.Connection conn, java.lang.String game_title, java.lang.String game_description, java.lang.String game_image, int publisher_id, int genre_id, int rating_id, float game_price)
      Calls the stored procedure to create a new game
      Parameters:
      conn - An open connection to the database
      game_title - Game's title
      game_description - Game's description
      game_image - Game's image
      publisher_id - Game's publisher
      genre_id - Generated genre ID
      rating_id - Generated rating ID
      game_price - Game's price
      Returns:
      Boolean to check if the game was created

    • update

      public static boolean update​(java.sql.Connection conn, java.lang.String game_title, java.lang.String game_description, java.lang.String game_image, int publisher_id, int genre_id, int rating_id, float game_price, boolean game_isActive)
      Calls the stored procedure to update a game
      Parameters:
      conn - An open connection to the database
      game_title - Game's title
      game_description - Game's description
      game_image - Game's image
      publisher_id - Game's publisher
      genre_id - Generated genre ID
      rating_id - Generated rating ID
      game_price - Game's price
      game_isActive - Filters for active/inactive games
      Returns:
      Boolean to check if the game was updated
